0.name: Mick
0.text: (I hope they haven't found out I ate all of the FavFood...

1.name: Mick
1.text: Hey, are you reading my thoughts?

2.name: Mick
2.text: Cut it out! That's an invasion of privacy!

3.name: Mick
3.text: Take this and forget what you just heard.)

5.name: Mick
5.text: (I can smell some Dog Treats in the basement.

6.name: Mick
6.text: If you fetch them for me, I'll let you go.)
